message:
hi, i installed this on windows 7, I am getting the following error when i try to login to the PIA :CHECK APPSERVER LOGS. THE SITE BOOTED WITH INTERNAL DEFAULT SETTINGS, BECAUSE OF: bea.jolt.ServiceException: Invalid Session
The application server is down at this time.

Moreover when i try to boot the domain using PSADMIN i get the following error: "tmadmin is not recognized as an internal or external command,..."
Also, when i try to open tuxedo command line from PSADMIN it gives me the same error as above alongwith "Unable to Load tmadmin !"

Could you please help me fix this?
